p: Evidence from different studies on ozone impacts or policy considerations between regions has resulted in a suite of metrics derived from human health and vegetation experiments, as well as developed for model comparison. Data for calculating various metrics may originate from ground-based monitoring networks, and ozonesonde, aircraft, lidar, and remote sensing (including satellite) measurements using different sampling time scales. The official list of TOAR metrics is described at http://www.igacproject.org/activities/TOAR, and a comprehensive list of the statistics calculated in the TOAR database, including the official TOAR metrics, are described in TOAR-Surface Ozone Database.
